column2: Reporting to the Country Head, this position holds the important duty to maintain high-performing service support functions including IT Service Desk, Desktop Support, and VIP Support       The position will be the owner of the Incident and Service requests, Change and Escalation processes, ensuring high levels of performance in these processes, accurate reporting, and establishing service improvement activities as the time demands     As the owner of the escalation process, our Service Delivery Manager will take ownership of major incidents to ensure coordination of resolving parties, effective communication with stakeholders, and post-incident reviews     Equally important will be to monitor, control, and support service delivery; ensuring systems, methodologies and procedures are in place and followed impeccably     Champion for Service and Support in projects and developing a strong understanding of projects impacting your service area and ensuring service impact is minimized and agreed upon is an essential aspects of this position     The incumbent will demonstrate reliability and be accountable for the quality of service and performance; ensuring future demand from growth and projects is understood and factored into capacity plans for all associated systems     She/ He will drive internal and third-party service review meetings covering performance, service improvements, quality, and processes              The Person              To succeed in this role, candidates must have a Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related subject with ITIL qualification knowledge of its disciplines       A minimum of 5 years experience in Service Management professional and prior experience as a Team Lead or demonstrable experience in leading virtual teams     Plus the experience of managing 3rd parties and 3rd party-delivered services     Also managing service or support in a large-scale and diverse environment of incident management, escalation procedures, and related disciplines The candidate will offer excellent leadership skills with a team-oriented and motivating approach, to set an example as the manager in maintaining integrity     The candidate will offer excellent interpersonal, stakeholder management, and communication skills ( written and verbal ) in English

Team Leadership:  Guide a high-performing, cross-functional team to design, implement, and maintain robust infrastructure solutions that align with business goals and industry best practices. Trend Analysis and Adaptation:  Stay abreast of emerging trends in infrastructure management, particularly in AI Ops and automation tools, ensuring continuous learning and adaptation within the team. Strategic Planning:  Develop and execute a Go-To-Market Strategy, leveraging team capabilities and market insights to foster growth and expansion. Roadmap Development:  Define and maintain the Business Units roadmap, incorporating technological advancements and market dynamics. Revenue and Profitability:  Drive revenue growth and profitability for the Infrastructure Management Business Unit through effective sales and marketing strategies. Financial Management:  Oversee budgets, initiate cost optimization measures, and ensure financial targets are met. Collaboration and Coordination:  Work with delivery, support functions, and management to meet client expectations and achieve performance objectives. Expertise:  Strong technical expertise, business acumen, financial management skills, and awareness of industry trends. Track Record of Success:  Demonstrated success in achieving revenue targets, delivering profitable engagements, and building high-performing teams. Large-Scale Team Management:  Experience managing a global team of 500+ members.

column2: The candidate is able to shape, organize and drive a large-scale transformation program, advise our clients on their ERP transformation roadmap and associated business case. Experience in SAP Functional modules (SD, MM, CRM, FICO, HR).  Program Manager/Delivery leader preferred. Experience on S/4HANA projects is good to have. Managing a portfolio of projects for global customers (team size of 50-100+ associates) Preferably, functional SAP delivery leader who started with Functional background Finance, HR would be best but other modules will also work. 15+ years of experience in SAP large projects / program management. The leader should have passion to work with our clients, advising them on how to get the most out of their SAP transformation, driving both business and IT transformation.  Endowed with a natural leadership, your qualities of customer relationship and business understanding are recognized. Oriented towards the satisfaction of your customers, you are driven by a taste for      challenge, and you know how to transform constraints into opportunities. The candidate should be used to work in an international environment, with different teams business advisory consultants, solution experts, marketing and sales teams and create networks across countries.  The leader is engaging and enthusiastic communicator with strong interpersonal and presentation skills.  Candidates experience in presenting to senior client stakeholders goes up to and including Cxo-level  The Candidate have strong connections with the broader SAP ecosystem e.g. SAP and other relevant partner organizations. Deep knowledge in one or more of SAP functional areas (Finance, HR or Procurement are preferred) The candidate should be mobile, have a good level of English and like innovative projects. Offshore or international experience would be a real plus. Experience in Financial Services industry is preferred. PMP or Delivery Certification is a plus.

column2: Collaborating with the EMEA Actuarial teams and IT partners to develop and run actuarial models                                      Defining input data requirements to support country specific reporting requirements.                       Working within the Global Actuarial Modeling team to produce and deliver actuarial results for regional MetLife customers.                                     Principal responsibilities of the role:                                   Oversee modelling efforts and engaging with business customers.                             Build models in line with MetLife s Global Actuarial Modeling Prophet coding standards.                             Perform testing activities to provide quality assurance to the customer.                             Support production activities to deliver actuarial results to satisfy various reporting exercises and various financial impact assessments.                             Support GAM priorities to deliver on regulatory imperatives like IFRS17 or LDTI as applicable                                       Key performance indicators (KPIs) of position:                                     Error-free preparation of financial reports to required timescales and relevant actuarial standards                                 Execution of data validation and completeness checks                                  Contributing towards building a culture of collaboration, engagement, and trust while supporting the professional development of team members                                 Ensuring open communication across teams in various functions and geographies.                                 Taking demonstrable ownership of work; clearly flagging any issues and goal delivery concerns to senior leadership team.                                         Essential Experience, Skills and Competencies:                                   Nearly/newly qualified actuary from a recognized profession or qualified by suitable experience. Support the Global Lead and collaborate with other members of the global mobility leadership team to determine and drive global priorities and consistent approaches, develop global service enhancements, and support global stakeholders. Promote a unified global mobility team and a common understanding of global mobility programs, processes, and practices.      Champion and enable high caliber service delivery and value in accordance with strategic mobility program vision, mission, and goals. Ensure a strong understanding of actual service performance relative to stakeholder needs, priorities and interests serves as the basis of service delivery decisions.      Develop, monitor, and communicate indicators of service health and operational performance such as dashboards, reporting, analytics, and insights to support visibility and accountability for operational, financial, and customer experience results.     Assess and evolve the mobility service delivery model. Oversee the transition of work to offshore teams and/or external providers, where appropriate. Ensure that both internally managed and externally provided services offer high quality and value. Contain service costs. Manage external immigration and mobility service providers to ensure they deliver outstanding service and value. Ensure service providers adhere to provisions of agreements and contracts. Assist in renegotiating scope of services, service levels, and reduced service fees, as appropriate. Inspire and influence peers and leadership by sharing expertise and insights on leading practices and trends to improve the employee experience.     Build and nurture strong, collaborative relationships throughout the organization.     Develop, forecast, and communicate mobility program budgetary needs relative to service delivery initiatives. column1: Key Account Manager/ BD Manager / Relationship Manager Insurance -BFSI
column2: Key Account Manager/Account Manager/Customer Success Manager/Relationship Manager/BD Manager - BFSI Preferred candidate profile     Job Description:  The person will be responsible for active client engagement and ensuring seamless communication between client and Company. This essentially involves raising and ensuring completion of all requests/requirements/concerns raised by the client or Company in a cordial manner. This engagement role is aimed at business growth and therefore involves reviewing of ongoing delivery and meeting client expectations as well as of the Company. It further requires active inter departmental coordination in an efficient and harmonious way. Measure of success here will be on both input parameters as well as output with growth in business being a key parameter.     Detailed Activities / KRAs   - MoMs for all client meetings and making sure all items are closed by escalating internally as well as to clients. Holding regular business reviews as and when required by Company/Client. - Maintaining a tracker for presentations/proposals sent to existing clients - Ensuring weekly quality and production updates are shared with all clients  - Once a week client wise status updates open items, performance concerns etc. to internal stakeholders. Driving closures. - Sending monthly presentations to clients and driving Monthly Business Reviews with clients. - Drawing inferences from regular MIS and weekly snapshot/summary to be sent with key highlights (where are we doing better and vice versa along with actions taken) - Tracking open items from client side with ageing, responsibility, proper follow-up and escalation. - Timely sharing of month's projection of expected business (both internally and to client) - Newsletters to be sent to all clients by 10th of every month - Pursue business expansion related discussions with existing clients - Proactive updates to client on any delays, internal planning, holidays etc. - Business volume projection to be maintained at-least for a quarter in advance - Drive regular assessments on product knowledge and involve client in sessions - Seeking competition information and champion challenger programs with clients - F2F meetings with all clients minimum 2 with each client in a month (upto 12 clients) - Maintaining a list of all enablers, its status and follow through with clients for enabling all tools. - Active engagement with client as well as internal teams with an objective to ensure good service delivery that drives business growth.   Key Skills Required: - Excellent in English communication (written and verbal). - High energy and zeal to take initiatives and drive closures. - Effective cordial ways of working and soft skills. - Attentiveness towards addressing critical issues - Strong presentation skills to senior management - MS Office (Powerpoint, Excel, Word).  - Knowledge of Canva, Prezi, MS Project and familiarity with using LinkedIn, Emailing tools, etc. will be added advantage.   Location:  Mumbai (Hybrid) Work Experience:   Minimum 5-7 years (total) with 3 years in customer engagement role (BFSI) Qualification:  Any Graduate/PG Reporting to:  VP Sales & Marketing
column11: Client Development, Key Account Management, Business Development Management, customer success manager, Client Relationship, Strategic Account Management, Key Client Management, Cross Sales, Revenue Generation, Customer Relationship, Upselling, Sales, Customer Retention, CSM
